_comment2: Copy this file to config.dev.json or config.prod.json and fill in your values
_comment_unused_environment: UNUSED - This field is not used in code. Environment is detected from ENV variable or config file name

preprocessing._comment: Preprocessing settings for document preparation before OCR

rotation_detection._comment_enabled: Enable automatic rotation detection and correction (default: true)
rotation_detection._comment_method: Primary detection method: 'paddleocr' (best performance, requires paddlepaddle) or 'tesseract' (fallback)
rotation_detection._comment_fallback: Methods to try if primary fails (in order). Use ['tesseract'] as fallback
rotation_detection._comment_threshold: Minimum confidence (0.0-1.0) to accept rotation detection. 0.5 recommended for scanned/handwritten documents

paddleocr._comment_lang: Language for PaddleOCR (ru, en, ch, etc.). Supports 109 languages including handwritten text
paddleocr._comment_gpu: Use GPU acceleration if available (requires CUDA-capable GPU)

ocr._comment: OCR configuration - Azure Document Intelligence for document processing

azure._comment: Azure Document Intelligence credentials and settings
azure._comment_model: Options: 'prebuilt-layout' (recommended - best structure preservation), 'prebuilt-read' (faster, basic text)

paragraph_processor._comment_min: Minimum non-whitespace characters to keep paragraph (default: 10)
paragraph_processor._comment_max: Max consecutive empty paragraphs before page break (default: 1)
paragraph_processor._comment_normalize: Clean up extra whitespace in paragraphs (default: true)

translation._comment: Translation configuration - Google Cloud Translation API v3

google_doc._comment: Google Cloud Translation API credentials and settings
google_doc._comment_location: Google Cloud region for translation API (us-central1 recommended)
google_doc._comment_source: Default source language code (e.g., 'ru', 'es', 'fr') or null for auto-detect

pinecone._comment: Pinecone vector database configuration (optional - only used when use_pinecone is true)

scheduling._comment_unused_email_interval: UNUSED - Email interval setting is not used in code
